rounds.name: First Round
description: Company sent us a link of doc file in which question was explained.
This was held on Google Meet where you had to keep you webcam ON
The round was for 1hr but in case if you want some extra time they can give you extra 10mins more
For question and solution please follow along with the below link
rounds.focused: Problem solving, Graphs, Graph traversal algorithms
rounds.result: Out of 60-70 students 8 get qualified for the next round

rounds.name: Second Round
description: This round is conducted same as the 1st round
Question was continuation of of the first round's question
For question and solution please follow along with the below link
rounds.focused: Problem solving, Graphs, Graph traversal algorithms
rounds.result: Out of 8 students 7 get qualified for the next round

rounds.name: Third Round
description: This round was held on Google meet, they told me to introduce myself
They asked me about intership projects
Walk through to the second round's code
As I told them about React.js, they asked me life cycle of React.js
Binary trees time complexity, Do you know about AVL tree
Sorting algorithms, which one is best and under what circumstances which algorithm you will choose for sorting, Hash tables
They asked me about what database you know, as I told them PostgreSQL and MongoDB they asked me difference between NoSQL and SQL
Do you know indices in database
I have mentioned python in resume so they asked following questions
Difference between list and tuple
How dictionary is implemented in python, What possible types we can use as a key in dictionary
Do you know about Decorators, Generators in Python
Is there anything similar to generator in Javascript
Difference between lambda and def keyword
Tail recursion, Deep copy and shallow copy
rounds.focused: Intership projects, basic and core about programming language you used
rounds.result: From 7 students 3 got final offer, I was one of them
